    K

    KeyController - Class in flappygame
     
    KeyController(GameBoard) - Constructor for class flappygame.KeyController
    Constructs a KeyController tied to a specific GameBoard.
    keyPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class flappygame.KeyController
    Handles all key press events for game control: - R key resets the game during gameplay - SPACE makes the player jump during gameplay - ESCAPE quits the game from either gameplay or menu
    keyReleased(KeyEvent) - Method in class flappygame.KeyController
    Not used in this implementation.
    keyTyped(KeyEvent) - Method in class flappygame.KeyController
    Not used in this implementation.
